sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content: Returns the height of the menu bar. Useful when drawing or placing widgets to make certain that they don't overlap the menu bar.
sections.text_content: Returns the height of the menu bar. Useful when drawing or placing widgets to make certain that they don't overlap the menu bar.
sections.mdown_content: Returns the height of the menu bar. Useful when drawing or placing widgets to make certain that they don't overlap the menu bar.

sections.title: Example
code:
import GUI in "%oot/lib/GUI"
        
        var menu : int := GUI.CreateMenu ("File")
        var item : int := GUI.CreateMenuItem ("Quit", GUI.Quit)
        
        Draw.FillBox (0, 0, maxx, maxy  GUI.GetMenuBarHeight  2, 
            brightred)
        
        loop
            exit when GUI.ProcessEvent
        end loop

sections.title: Status
sections.raw_content:
